column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jet says : " I think Lee would make a good Freedom Fighter .
#Text=" Jet says : " I know he did n't get that scar from a waterbender .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Besides , I thought we were going straight now .
#Text=" Jet says : " We are , and the new Freedom Fighters could use a guy like Lee .
#Text=What do you think , Longshot ?
#Text=" Jet says : " I can respect that .
#Text=" General Sung says : " What 's wrong with him ?
#Text=He does n't look injured .
#Text=" Katara says : " His chi is blocked .
#Text=Who did this to you ?
#Text=" Terra Team member says : " Two girls ambushed us .
#Text=One of them hit me with a bunch of quick jabs and suddenly I could n't earthbend anymore and I could barely move .
#Text=Then she cartwheeled away .
#Text=" Katara says : " Ty Lee .
#Text=She does n't look dangerous , but she knows the human body and its weak points .
#Text=It 's like she takes you down from the inside .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ooh , ooh , ooh , ooh !
#Text=Ooh !
#Text=" Katara says : " Yes ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " What you just said !
#Text=That 's how we 're going to take down the drill !
#Text=The same way Ty Lee took down all those big earthbenders !
#Text=" Toph says : " By hitting its pressure points !
#Text=" Aang says : " We 'll take it down from the inside .
#Text="
